original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人成功與<color=#b6f8f4>$country1</color>勢力結為同盟！一年內，兩方停止戰鬥、計略，公開情報及領地通行。
text: Master Qi, his subordinates have sent people to successfully form an alliance with the <color=#b6f8f4>$country1</color> forces! Within a year, the two sides stopped fighting, planning, and disclosed information and territory passage.
